text: Kunghit Island is an island in the Canadian province of British Columbia. It is the southernmost island in the Haida Gwaii archipelago, located to the south of Moresby Island. The southernmost point of Kunghit Island, called Cape St James, is used to delineated the boundary between Hecate Strait and Queen Charlotte Sound. The only habitation on Kunghit Island is Rose Harbour, on its north shore. Kunghit Island is long and ranges in width from . It is in area. Houston Stewart Channel separates Kunghit and Moresby Islands.Kunghit Island , The Columbia Gazetteer of North America == See also == * List of islands of British Columbia ==References== ==External links== * Category:Islands of Haida Gwaii Category:Haida Category:North Coast Regional District
title: Kunghit Island
